chunk:
Esther & Mila Super Moisture Plumping Mask

Brand: Esther & Mila

Category: Mask

Ingredients: distilled water, glycerin (plant-based), rose hydrosol, propanediol, hyaluronic acid, caprylyl glycol, and phenoxyethanol.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
